remarks.format: ## Remarks This class overrides this method to ensure that a non-empty `Text` property value is available when the control is rendered for display on the design surface. This makes sure that the class has a meaningful representation. This method sets any empty `Text` property of the control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the control.
